doPowerRecharge

public static boolean doPowerRecharge()
Returns an indicator of whether the application should roll power recharges automatically.

Returns:
true, if the application should roll to recharge powers automatically when a creature starts its turn

setDoPowerRecharge

public static void setDoPowerRecharge(java.lang.Boolean value)
Sets an indicator of whether the application should roll power recharges automatically.

Parameters:
value - true, if the application should roll to recharge powers automatically when a creature starts its turn

doSavingThrows

public static boolean doSavingThrows()
Returns an indicator of whether the application should roll saving throws automatically.

Returns:
true, if the application should roll saving throws automatically at the end of a creature's turn

public static void setDoSavingThrows(java.lang.Boolean value)
Sets an indicator of whether the application should roll saving throws automatically.

Parameters:
value - true, if the application should roll saving throws automatically at the end of a creature's turn
